title: Advanced 5G self-driving minibus to zoom into WIC
text:
By Fan Feifei | chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2019-10-14 13:08

Self-driving, avoiding other vehicles and making a turn -- these are just some of the eye-catching features of a new 5G self-driving minibus developed by BroadXT Inc.

The minibus will be launched on the first day of the sixth World Internet Conference in Wuzhen, Zhejiang province. It will also be used to help ferry guests to the venue during the conference.

Powered by a variety of advanced techniques such as sensors, high-precision positioning and a V2X cooperative vehicle infrastructure system, the minibus adopts level-4 autopilot technology and is able to identify pedestrians within 200 meters.
description: Self-driving, avoiding other vehicles and making a turn -- these are just some of the eye-catching features of a new 5G self-driving minibus developed by BroadXT Inc.
